extendedInfo.description: Best App for learning Mandarin Chinese and Travel China, Hong Kong, Taiwan and Singapore! Speaking essential Mandarin Chinese words and phrases with Li, experiencing high quality authentic audio and easy to follow Chinese character and pinyin.  Start from entry level and go from there. It is like you hired your own personal tutor and made a Chinese native friend. Learning a language is experiencing a new culture and open the door to a new world.  Li is thrilled to show you around!You will Learn essential Chinese conversational skills, including greetings and introductions, questions and answers, dinning out, travel and shopping, talking about your interests and hobbies, telling time, counting numbers and much more.Features:--Carefully selected, well organized essential real world phrases and categories that help you immediately to meet people, eat out, shopping and travel...--High quality clear audio from Li, a native Chinese speaker, the App designer and developer. You know that someone you can count on is behind the App.  Not robot voice like other Apps.--Innovative unique features: Auto play button enables playing while you are running errands, learn much faster than any other Apps!--Chinese Character, Pinyin and English translation in nice    large fonts. Clear and easy to follow.--Touch screen to listen to audio and see translation.--Character by character translation.--Audio flashcard format.--No internet connection needed--Daily pop up reminder can be turned on in settings.--Option of setting Quiz Mode in settings. Use Next button, next flashcard shows, click on screen, translation will appear, audio will play.  Audio (auto-play) button need to be Off when use quiz modeCategory covered:-Greetings-General Conversation (Large collection)-Hobbies-People-Eat & Drink-Travel & Directions-Love & Relationship-Shopping-Places-Numbers-Time & Day-Colors-Animals & PetsLi was born in China, a part time Chinese teacher and an Engineer. Li designed, developed this App and recorded the audio. Yes, what you hear is her voice.  A lots of English speaking friends asked her questions about Chinese language, food and culture, which inspires her to publish this App.  Li loves travel and experiencing world cultures and languages.China has a booming economy and great growth potential. China has five thousands of years splendid civilization and Chinese language is the core of Chinese culture. More and more people are interested in learning Chinese. Download this App if you are learning Chinese or before you travel to China, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Singapore.  It is simply the best App for learning Chinese!Feedback:If you like this app and find it useful please take a few seconds to give us a rating in the Android Market. For comments and suggestions please send an email to cloudspeedapps@gmail.com  We love to hear from you!Learn Chinese with Li is honored to be the App of the Week from Australia Telstra Exchange.  Read the full review:http://exchange.telstra.com.au/?p=18501Join Learn Chinese Community on Google Plus:https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/114086323099834306817Follow Li on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/LearnChineseWithLiFollow Li on twitter: @LearnChineseLiFollow Li on Google+ page: http://gplus.to/LearnChinese

reviews.title: No title
reviews.comment: I like to have it playing in the background as I work, but would like the ability to shuffle so that it\'s not in the same order every time (so that I think about the meaning, rather than just remembering the order they are in)
reviews.author: Adam Hajnik

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Thanks to Reviewers and description, very close to what I was looking for.  It cycles through chinese expressions first saying mandarin, then saying english.  Says each one 3 times.  So I can just turn it on and do other things while I slowly learn chinese.  Other apps require reading or touching screen.  I think saying english first would be better but since it says the expression 3 times, good enough.  Just remember at the end of the 3rd time, the english isn\'t for the next chinese expression, a little confusing, english first would be much better.
reviews.author: Art Smith

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Help me a lot on my trip to Beijing and Taiwan.  Best Chinese leaning App. Like the new version which allow me repeating the longer phrases
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Learn Chinese with Li Pou
reviews.comment: The paid version is not worth it.  Save your money.
reviews.author: Mark Littiebrant

reviews.title: Phrasebook
reviews.comment: Useful collection of phrases, but it\'s difficult to navigate and the quiz seeing is awful. It says the english right away, while showing the pinyin and characters. Regret paying for it. Should have gotten the free version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: There are other free apps that have more vocab than this. It says hundreds..um more like 60 phrases..sound and pics are great but needs more words like maybe have 300...ok.......month later.....the updates are cool...i like this app....but now needs to have were we could save to sd card
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice.
reviews.comment: I wish there was a challenge mode, so after seeing the characters you have to guess the pinyin.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good content
reviews.comment: Please support to move app to sdcard or move media to sdcard. I like the autoplay and repeating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: G\304\201nd\303\241h\303\241o, Li!!!!!
reviews.comment: Good job, Li!!!!!  I love this app.  I have impressed others with how much I have learned in just a few weeks.  More importantly, I am impressed with how much I have learned and how easy it was.  Thanks for making it easy!!!  Am looking foward to learning more.  The next release cant come soon enough.  :) Sorry I cant give more stars.  :) Xie xie, ZaiJian
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fast way to learn Mandarin
reviews.comment: Good sound quality/clarity, good flashcard layout. Would get 5 stars with option to show traditional Chinese characters (Taiwan, Hong Kong) and some kind of category browsing option. Students note: As with any widely spoken language (like English), some expressions are regional, e.g. saying \346\227\251\344\270\212\345\245\275 in Taiwan may result in getting some strange looks, they understand it but use \346\227\251\345\256\211 instead. \"You\'re welcome\" is usually \344\270\215\345\256\242\346\260\243 in Taiwan instead of what is used here, etc. This app is a great study tool and a way to interact more when abroad, you\'ll make friends who will teach you the nuances later :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like seeing the Chinese characters and Pinyin and background. Best of all, its authentic accents.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: very good app
reviews.comment: i recomend it! i like that i can listen to it as i work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like China
reviews.comment: I bought it just for li
reviews.author: A Google User
